TopicTitle: Save confirmation on VAB/SPH exit should be optional.

Articles.Content: Seriously, the dialogue is extremely annoying. Perhaps a checkbox at the bottom of the dialogue for "Do not show this again" would be prudent.

I'm all for "never show this" checkboxes though, on all the things.
